name: Not Enough Space
description:
NOTE: REQUIRES XBOX CONTROLLERS AND CONTROLLERS MAY NOT WORK ON MAC OR LINUX

This is Not Enough Space. It is a local multiplayer game for up to four players where you try to knock your opponents off of the planet with bombs! Be careful though, some of these bombs are already lit!

Controls:

Button Action Joystick Move Character A Jump B Throw Bomb

A game made by:

Name Link Alexis https://ldjam.com/users/alexispoquiz/ Casey https://ldjam.com/users/danteexe/ Hunter https://ldjam.com/users/mactinite/ Matt https://ldjam.com/users/sleepyshaman/ Young https://ldjam.com/users/pandachan/
